overview: A Gay erotic drama that deal with the controversial issue of barebacking and the pressure on young gay men to have unsafe sex. Andy has troubled memories of a time when he was bullied by a muscular skinhead and nagged by his boyfriend Joe for not being sexually adventurous. When Joe tries to have unsafe sex, Andy walks out for good. Andy's adventures get rougher and the sex he has darker, although always safe. Finally when Andy encounters the skinhead bully and Joe in the same location he has to make a tough decision, to confront his past or forgive and forget.
title: ASBO Twinks
